[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
I've been teaching my kids how to make my grandmothers jello recipe, it's time to pass it on!
Family traditions are important.  Its good to get kids interested in cooking early.  I may have to lay off for awhile because I am picking up so weight and I don't need the sugar.
Lay off what, jello, or desserts in general?
Honesty, both.  I started to watch baking how-to-video to learn to bake, and I am shocked at just how much sugar in in desserts.

[MEMORY]

Why don't you have the time? ### Speaker B: They were always pretty busy running their grocery store and I never really got much of a chance to spend that kind of time with them before they died, unfortunately. ### Speaker A: My grandma just taught me an even better cherry jello recipe than the one she taught me before.  ### Speaker B: Nice! How did it turn out? ### Speaker A: Not too bad but still needs some work! ### Speaker B: I am sure the more you make it the better it will get. Has your grandma taught you to make anything else? ### Speaker A: She's taught me how to make all kinds of recipes but all of them are with jello.  So I may need to find a different teacher to learn some new recipes! Do you like to bake? ### Speaker B: No I don't do a lot of cooking or baking, I do want to learn though but I don't have anyone to teach me. ### Speaker A: Well my grandma would be happy to get you started on the jello recipes, haha! You can consider her your surrogate grandma, she would just love that. Have you been snowboarding lately?' }
